title: 4 Wheels Robot
detail: Virtually connected single wheel robots in a set of four. Let's see what can be empowered by teamwork of wheels.
extended_details: virtually connected single wheel robots in a set of four. Will it be able to handle delivery, assist with moving, or carry you on a Segway mode and show you around our campus? Let's see what can be empowered by a teamwork of wheels.

parts_and_costs.part: Magnetic Encoder Pair Kit for Micro Metal Gearmotors, 12 CPR, 2.7-18V
50:1 Micro Metal Gearmotor HPCB 6V with Extended Motor Shaft
